website_summaries.verdict: These chunky and colorful candles sport surprisingly tasty scents, and will keep your home smelling yummy for a long time to come.
pros: Bold maple syrup scent, but there are others to choose from

customer_reviews.title: Best candle ever.
customer_reviews.text: I used to buy every candle I thought smelled great in stores. Only to bring them home and have them smoke, loose the scent burn messy you name it. This one I keep in stock because it gets compliments whenever it's out not even burning. It has been available for years but never have the makers changed it or compromised it. Now I give it as gifts, well received. Try one.
customer_reviews.author: KL McHugh

customer_reviews.title: Great candle
customer_reviews.text: It's a great candle. It'll give you a ton of maple buttery scent, it just was a tad too strong. We only light one wick at a time to make the scent not so strong.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Vosburgh

customer_reviews.title: Not sisters favorite
customer_reviews.text: My sister loves candles and thought I'd surprised her with this. She wasn't thrilled with the throw of the candle and it didn't burn evenly. Disappointed as I wanted to send her something nice. Will stick with Yankee as she loved the last one I sent her.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Poppins 57

customer_reviews.title: By far the best candle ive EVER bought in my 38yrs
customer_reviews.text: By far the best candle ive EVER bought in my 38yrs!!! I'm blown away! I can light it when i get home from work, blow it out when i go to bed & not only does my bedroom still smell completely like the candle, but when i got home from work 19 HOURS later when i got home from work my room still smells completely off this candle! Beyond awesome on all levels! !!
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Excellent scent and long lasting candle!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased the Crossroads Buttered Maple Syrup candles many times over the years and they have never disappointed! The 26 ounce candle lasts a long time when burning. If you use a candle warmer, the scent lasts forever as well. I will continue to purchase this product in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Dynomite

customer_reviews.title: Smells soooo good it makes me hungry
customer_reviews.text: This is my absolute favorite scent!! It smells up my entire two story house with a buttery pancake smell. Looove it
customer_reviews.author: jeralyn duncan

customer_reviews.title: The smell is Devine
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with this smell . It’s lasting for sure ! The reaches my whole house and we have a large one . I burn this for hours each day and it lasts forever . This will be a candle I constantly purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Ross

customer_reviews.title: No scent at all
customer_reviews.text: After reading all the great reviews I was very disappointed receiving these. I have 2 of them burning right now and can't smell them at all. I have bought this brand in the past and loved it. Maybe I got a bad batch? Not sure but at $25 each I won't be reordering to find out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wicks need improving
customer_reviews.text: Loved the smell and how long it lasts, however, the wicks kept swaying to the sides after about halfway through the candle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sweetness
customer_reviews.text: Smell great. I just want to eat my house. I get compliments all the time. When it's not burning it lingers. When I have guest come over, they love that maple syrup smell that hits them as soon as they walk in. Very inviting, sweet, and smells delicious!
customer_reviews.author: Lois

customer_reviews.title: It smelled alright at first. The smaller the candle ...
customer_reviews.text: It smelled alright at first. The smaller the candle got the less it smelled. It had a strange almost chemically smell when not lit. Go to crossroadscandles.com they have buttered maple candle that is out of this world!!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: No smell
customer_reviews.text: Came with a very shop worn lid, I think it must have been old, because I don’t smell anything, it is slow burning and lasts, but I just light it for visual, no aroma.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Marie

customer_reviews.title: Delicious smell!
customer_reviews.text: Loved the aroma so much I bought another one. Beautiful color for fall or winter holidays!
customer_reviews.author: N.D.

customer_reviews.title: My favorite
customer_reviews.text: Had the most amazing smell, better then any yankee candle.
customer_reviews.author: Jennie

customer_reviews.title: Better than Yankee Candle
customer_reviews.text: Amazing!!!! I almost always buy Yankee Candle Scent- Salted Caramel and this candle is one is better! Smells better, burns longer...
customer_reviews.author: Babygmadrigal

customer_reviews.title: Smells Amazing!!!
customer_reviews.text: This candle smells amazing. So strong!! It had leaked in the box upon arrival. I ordered it in may for mother’s day. Other than the oily box it was packaged well and I would definitely buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Well made candle
customer_reviews.text: every time when I light up this candle, it reminds me the maple bacons I cooked on the Sunday morning. And yes, it does smell like that full house.. Maple Syrup. Very well made candle. Burn even, smooth maple syrup smell. Will but this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Shortty

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting and smells great
customer_reviews.text: My favorite candle ever! Smells amazing, leaves no residue on the glass, and lasts! I will continue to buy this candle forever.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda C.

customer_reviews.title: YUMMY!!
customer_reviews.text: These are AWESOME!! Bought several directly from Crossroads Candles. Make the whole house smell like Maple Syrup!! GREAT BUY
customer_reviews.author: Clinton Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Bummed
customer_reviews.text: This doesn’t smell up the whole house like the exact same one I’ve bought from a local floral shop. It hasn’t lasted as long.
customer_reviews.author: jslink

customer_reviews.title: There is no better smelling candle in existence
customer_reviews.text: There is no better smelling candle in existence. Crossroads candles burn longer and stronger than any other brand. Buy them. No seriously. Do it.
customer_reviews.author: Wes

customer_reviews.title: Yum!
customer_reviews.text: The scent profile of this candle carries through the room even when not lit. And I love it!!! I will never look for another Maple scented candle again. This is the one!
customer_reviews.author: Haunt Darling

customer_reviews.title: Fills my home with a wonderful smell that lasts even after candle blown out.
customer_reviews.text: Scent is exactly as named. Fills my home with a wonderful smell that lasts even after candle blown out. I don't usually use food scent candles but I was in a gift shop and somehow it reminded me of fall. Warm & cozy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Favorite candle in the world
customer_reviews.text: My favorite candle in the world. Long lasting and can’t beat the scent and quality
customer_reviews.author: B-Rad

customer_reviews.title: BEST CANDLE EVER !!!
customer_reviews.text: Repeat costumer !!! Most satisfying candle you will ever buy !!! I've learned a valuable lesson, NEVER TO BUY ANOTHER BRAND !!! Never loses its scent & burns even !!!
customer_reviews.author: Dottie Jacks

customer_reviews.title: Canadas Wonderland
customer_reviews.text: It smells like how id imagine heaven smells like, but a very specific part of heaven where its just maple syrup
customer_reviews.author: Mathias Smith

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Best candle ever!! Smells up my whole house and it lasts a long time. Will never buy another candle besides this one.
customer_reviews.author: J Smith

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this candle three times, I love it! The smell is amazing and lasts the entire candle, the wicks burn evenly, no black soot, the jar is clean at the end, no left over wax on the jar. Shipping was quick and packaged well. Can't wait to try the other flavors!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Hiltner

customer_reviews.title: Best smelling candle!
customer_reviews.text: Yum!! Smells as good as it sounds! This is their best scent so far!
customer_reviews.author: Ellie

customer_reviews.title: Great candles ... burn slow, last long, great scents.
customer_reviews.text: I love this candle company. The smells that come from these candles will make you smile. This is a wonderful scent to have for fall and winter. Love love!
customer_reviews.author: Teri Bea

customer_reviews.title: Very nice candle for the money
customer_reviews.text: I love the smell good for the money I used it in my living room in my old home does it take long make your room smell very happy
customer_reviews.author: Donald L. Booker

customer_reviews.title: Smells amazing
customer_reviews.text: Good candle ! Has 2 wicks and burns nicely Smells really good
customer_reviews.author: C.gArRa

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Smells nice but not overpowering Will buy the larger next time
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yummy!
customer_reviews.text: Smells so good! People walk in wanting pancakes and syrup then realize is just the candle!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley morales

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful fragrance. Arrived carefully packaged so it would not break.
customer_reviews.author: La

customer_reviews.title: Best candle ever
customer_reviews.text: Best candle ever!! You can smell it even when it is not burning! And when it is....well your whole house will smell so great!!
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne Novak

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift candle! Very fragrant and it lasts!
customer_reviews.text: What a wonderful scent! It filled my kitchen with the smell of maple syrup and pancakes! This is my favorite candle ever! It burns evenly too!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy allison

customer_reviews.title: Did the company change candle recipe??
customer_reviews.text: I usually love this particular scent.But I'm finding it has a very mild scent. Also, for some reason the scent doesn't last long. And every other time I've purchased this product the scent lasts even while not burning it. So I'm not sure why this jar is any different then others ive purchased. I'm just wondering if the company changed anything..
customer_reviews.author: Shawna Beaton

customer_reviews.title: This candle is actually her new favorite!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift for my candle-addict mother. She said it fills her whole first floor with a warm fragrance that is much stronger than the other Crossroads candle (French Toast) that I bought her. This candle is actually her new favorite!
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Brown

customer_reviews.title: The Best Candles!
customer_reviews.text: Crossroads candles are absolutely the best... the sent will fill your house!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: A must have!
customer_reviews.text: This candle is a must! Especially for fall, the smell goes all over the house and it’s huge and burns for awhile. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Madeline m.

customer_reviews.title: Buttered Maple Syrup Candle
customer_reviews.text: The first candle i ordered was wonderful. I could set it on the shelf not even lit, with the top still on and the aroma would fill the whole bathroom. So I ordered another one, but the aroma was just not as strong as I expected it to be. It is still a good candle
customer_reviews.author: ronnie

customer_reviews.title: Mmmm
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect candle to fill our home with a yummy fall scent!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Melton

customer_reviews.title: Good aroma - but wouldn't buy again
customer_reviews.text: Delicious aroma, but candle melts down too quickly. For this money, I wouldn't purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Love this candle, thank you Crossroads!
customer_reviews.text: Love this candle, definitely buying crossroads candles from now on. The scent lasts so long and I love the way my home smells.
customer_reviews.author: Wanda Browning

customer_reviews.title: Smells amazing, it has actually tricked me into thinking someone ...
customer_reviews.text: Smells amazing, it has actually tricked me into thinking someone is making pancakes, even though I am the one who lit it. Good job, candle.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Olding

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Smells amazing! Bought almost 4 months ago, and I’m still burning it!
customer_reviews.author: Sydney Hicks

customer_reviews.title: This is our favorite flavor and the candles burn evenly
customer_reviews.text: Can't find these in the stores anymore so my daughter and I order them from Amazon. This is our favorite flavor and the candles burn evenly. We love them.
customer_reviews.author: Consiglia

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Smells great and is long lasting! Makes me hungry though, but I'm always hungry...so yeah
customer_reviews.author: 4fuxsake

customer_reviews.title: This is by far one of the best smelling candles I have ever had
customer_reviews.text: This is by far one of the best smelling candles I have ever had! I will definitely purchase again once it's gone.
customer_reviews.author: Neustel

customer_reviews.title: Does not smell like.Maple smells like Wax
customer_reviews.text: Was not happy bought one last year at à shop on Pa same brand but got this aweful Will not cet again!!!
customer_reviews.author: Martha Hetrick

customer_reviews.title: Simply not my preferred scent.
customer_reviews.text: Not a fan of this smell. I like the double wick.
customer_reviews.author: Sparklystar

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Smell is strong throughout my house. Burns about 5 times longer than a bath and body candle.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Howe

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this candle..... lovely smell an last a long while
customer_reviews.author: Sue Woods

customer_reviews.title: Fab scent
customer_reviews.text: love it . scent is yummy and strong enough to go through the whole house. will buy again
customer_reviews.author: donna

customer_reviews.title: Best candles
customer_reviews.text: Best smelling long lasting candles! I've tried tons of other candles including bath and body works. Other candles don't even compare! Also got my candle quickly and it was well packaged.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: amazing
customer_reviews.text: i will continue to buy this over and over again. i’m obsessed with this candle!!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Smith

customer_reviews.title: Not what it is supposed to be.
customer_reviews.text: No smell. Fake candle. I will not purchase from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pricey, but good
customer_reviews.text: Love the scent. Fills the room. Glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: BJK

customer_reviews.title: this was by far the best.
customer_reviews.text: once this candled was lit,in my bedroom,with my door closed,everyone that came into the house wanted to know what they were smelling cause it smelled" amazing" they would say...and my door was closed! We've purchased tons of candles over the years,this was by far the best.
customer_reviews.author: tamra pierson

customer_reviews.title: Best candle there is
customer_reviews.text: Best candle there is! By far! It smells up entire room, and the smell is amazing!! I won't buy any other candle.
customer_reviews.author: Marla Duvall

customer_reviews.title: Favorite winter scents!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my favorite winter scents! Long burn time.
customer_reviews.author: eric

customer_reviews.title: Best candle and scent ever.
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the best candle ever. Scent is amazing, I always get compliments.
customer_reviews.author: roctopuls

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This smells so good, its almost editable!! No real strong either
customer_reviews.author: Patricia K. Houts

customer_reviews.title: Unhappy.
customer_reviews.text: Unhappy with this product description said long lasting scent and you can hardly smell the candle at all! Unfortunately there is no return label so I'm stuck with them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is bar far the best candle I have ever used!
customer_reviews.author: Kim Regan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the smell and makes the house smell so great
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smells delicious!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite jar candle by far... Burns evenly, smells terrific. Great for gift-giving! Never been disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Sams

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My children loved this candle last year so much I ordered two this year.
customer_reviews.author: Cherlynann

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this product, it smells so good, everyone thatwalks in comments on the sweet smell
customer_reviews.author: leann cromer

customer_reviews.title: Happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I have always done yankee candles. I decided to try crossroads. The candle is slightly different proportions compared to yankee but it feels like you get more. My crossroads candle was drenched in oil when I received it, oil that also caked the top of the candle but probably gives it decent scent. I haven't burned through it yet to know if it seems to last longer or less. And I'm not sure my candle shades will fit it. But I am happy with it. Scent seems about as strong as yankee candle. Lid is super cheap plastic.
customer_reviews.author: H. HunTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: 26oz Buttered Maple Syrup
customer_reviews.text: This is my all time favorite candle..usually. I ordered 2 and both came coated is residual wax..ok..a bit disappointing, but easy enough to clean off. My HUGE issue is neither have the "usual" wonderful strong scent or scent throw. I can typically light one and it fills the main upper floor. These barely added fragrance to the room they were in. Sigh. Definitely not the quality I am accustomed to.
customer_reviews.author: Mouse7088

customer_reviews.title: Smells Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: I usually buy the 64oz. size in the same scent. This time I went with the 26oz. because it was on sale for $19-$20 ish. I discovered that it doesn't fill the room with scent as well as the larger one. I'm sure it has something to do with the difference is size or the number of wicks, but it was a little disappointing after becoming used to the larger size. Still a nice candle with a wonderful scent - but if you have the ability to purchase the larger size it's well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: DAlex

customer_reviews.title: Loved this candle on my first original purchase
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered this product 3 times now. The very first time I ordered the candle I absolutely loved! My house smlled amazing! I recieved alot of compliments on how good it smelled. Once the candle was used up, I placed my 2nd order for another candle along w/wax melts. The 2nd candle and melts had a significantly decreased smell to them. Some time went by and for some hopeful reason I ordered a 3rd candle hoping for a better quality. Again I was disappointed in a very significant lack of smell to this candle. Considering the cost of these candles I had hoped for the same quality of candle I had originally bought in the first place.
customer_reviews.author: Kristie Davis

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite candle!
customer_reviews.text: I was given one of these candles for Christmas and I loved the scent. It was Roasted espresso. This time I got the Buttered maple syrup, and it's just as great! It burns nicely, and the scent radiates through the house. It was shipped out quickly, and was very well protected in lots of bubble wrap.
customer_reviews.author: sandy d

customer_reviews.title: My Absolute Favorite
customer_reviews.text: Of all the candles in all the world, this one is my favorite. I snatch them up everytime I find them for a decent price in stores. They last a reasonably long time, and make my house smell like a French patisserie. Amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Fabbityfab11

customer_reviews.title: It doesn't smell?
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing good about this candle, just received mine today and I thought it would smell amazing based on the reviews but I opened it and it doesn't smell like anything. I do not recommend buying. I'm going to try to burn it and see if that helps ...
customer_reviews.author: Joan

customer_reviews.title: Very little scent
customer_reviews.text: What happened? I have ordered many of these candles directly from Crossroads, and they smelled great. This one has hardly any scent at all. Very disappointed, it must not be a Crossroads candle.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: People commenting
customer_reviews.text: More than one person has commented on how good this candle smelled. lt also lasts forever. The only downside is that it's difficult to light, but not a big deal. l already bought two and l am gonna buy another.
customer_reviews.author: Steve More Wise

customer_reviews.title: Not at all happy
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these candles because they are some of my most favorite with a wonderful lingering fragrance that fills my entire downstairs living area. I bought 2 & am extremely disappointed! There is absolutely NO FRAGRANCE when they burn which makes me question if they are in actuality Crossroads candles or fakes. Have always had excellent experience with this brand. Not this with this order. $40.00 plus going in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Tara B.

customer_reviews.title: Substantial, Impressive!
customer_reviews.text: This scent is intoxicating! The candle is substantial and makes a very nice gift for men and women alike.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina L. Manning

customer_reviews.title: Love the spicy fragrance.
customer_reviews.text: Love this fragrance. Its long lasting when I remember to blow out the candle and NOT leave the room with it burning merrily away when I'm not in that room. These candles to last me a long time, and to repeat...I love the spicy fragrance.
customer_reviews.author: Mizzjinabq

customer_reviews.title: Smells good!
customer_reviews.text: Not quite as strong as I would like, smell stays in the room it’s in! Believe it or not, I used to get a maple candle that was a cheap Kmart brand that would smell up the entire house! They discontinued that one and I just can’t find it. This is an ok substitute at 3x’s the price!
customer_reviews.author: ScrappyKel

customer_reviews.title: A bit more expensive on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: I love this scent and candle but unsure why so expensive on Amazon? My local grocery store carries crossroads candle (although not all scents) and it's $19.99 for 26oz jar. I also buy in Amish country for $19.99 to $21.99 depending on store.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Moyer

customer_reviews.title: Great Scent
customer_reviews.text: If there is a better smelling candle, it hasn't reached my olfactory workings. I love this. it's my 3rd one.
customer_reviews.author: David Lilly

customer_reviews.title: Great long lasting smell
customer_reviews.text: Great long lasting smell. I would recommend ordering straight from the manufacturer though as the prices vary widely on Amazon based on the scent.
customer_reviews.author: Becky J

customer_reviews.title: This is a great scent and you will love how it makes your ...
customer_reviews.text: I first found this scent at a fall festival. They had it burning in an open air booth. It smelled incredible. I had been looking around different stores and festivals since, looking to buy more. Then I found it on Amazon. This is a great scent and you will love how it makes your home smell. Big hit with all that come through my home.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Smells delicious!
customer_reviews.text: This smells amazing if you love maple! Burns very clean and lasts a while.
customer_reviews.author: kaitlyn

customer_reviews.title: Love this fragrance!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried 3 different maple syrup candles recently and this Crossroads candle is the best! It has a realistic, pleasant fragrance that isn't over-powering. This will definitely be one of my all time favorite candle fragrances. And since it is 26 ounces, it will last a long time. So happy I found this on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Sally

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These candles smell great! It makes my Condo smell like I have been making cookies all day long.
customer_reviews.author: Mert

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE the smell of this candle. It lasts a long time as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kchabr

customer_reviews.title: Incredible scent
customer_reviews.text: The Crossroads Buttered Maple candle is one of my favorite scents. Great candle; great price!
customer_reviews.author: Jane S.

customer_reviews.title: Scent faded after 1st use
customer_reviews.text: This candle smells so delicious...... at first. When I went to light it for the second time, there was barely no scent to it what so ever. If this candle stayed as strong smelling as my initial use, it would have gotten 5 stars :(
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: Pleasant smells, but not even close
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this and the coffee and the coffee is worse...
customer_reviews.author: Ford

customer_reviews.title: Smells great!
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about this candle. Burns well and evenly. Smells great.
customer_reviews.author: LRS customer

customer_reviews.title: Delivery and quality is great.
customer_reviews.text: I love this candle. The aroma is amazing. This is the second one I bought and plan to buy another one soon.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey Ospina

customer_reviews.title: Amazing long lasting scent
customer_reviews.text: Scent is long lasting and the candle burns evenly and for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: GardenParty

customer_reviews.title: I'm in love with this candle
customer_reviews.text: I'm in love with this candle! I can smell the candle throughout my first floor. The candle burns very well and doesn't emanate black smoke like some other candles.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Favorite ever
customer_reviews.text: Please don't EVER stop making / carrying this candle. My favorite! And so many compliments from visitors!
customer_reviews.author: LuvLife2Day

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Cheaper than going to the store I usually find this candle in! My favorite all time scent
customer_reviews.author: Rachael

product_meta.title: Crossroads Buttered Maple Syrup Scented 2-Wick Candle, 26 Ounce
product_meta.description: Buttered Maple Syrup - A blend of sugary maple syrup and warm butter. Light up your home with a high quality, clean burning candle from Crossroads Original Designs. Crossroads scented candles are made with a very clean burning, blended paraffin wax which allows for the maximum amount of fragrance. Proudly made in the USA.
feature_bullets: Made from high-quality blended paraffin and comes with two lead-free wicks
Approximately 120 to 140 hours of burn time

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars310 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
specifications.Included Components: CWI Gifts Buttered Maple Syrup 26oz Jar Candle
